channel.title: RS stories
channel.description: Hey ppl well one day on rs i had bout 12.3m and an easter egg i just bought i was goin merchent it but by and accident I ATE IT!!!! i was soo mad...thats my story anyone wanna share your stories ;D

item.title: RS stories
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

a couple years back I remember a day. I was over at a friends house- he was at the general store and there were like 30 blue p hats in it 2gp ea or somtin…it’s scary, but phats used to be worthless…Oh! I got another report on the RS old times I found…I’ll mae a thread for it “Old Runescape”

Read full topic

item.title: RS stories
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

I went runecrafting at abby and forgot to take off my fire cape, I died

That’s the second one I lost. I also lost my ranger boots in that trip.

Read full topic

item.title: RS stories
item.dc:creator: @footballplayar34 footballplayar34
item.description:
@footballplayar34 wrote:

i bought a santa 2 years ago and traded for an easter egg on easter i accidently ate the egg.

i bought a white p hat for 500k last year the noob didnt know the price the next day i got banned

Read full topic

item.title: RS stories
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

i spent 15 mil on runes to screw around with in wild/cw/fight pits ect, I went out there with like 1/3 of them and fucking 3 hit u kills me in 3 dds specials. I felt stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: RS stories
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

That’s why people always keep them in notes…

I got a mask on the first day they came out, but I sold it for 10k to buy full black. Yeah, I felt pretty pimp. By the end of that day they were already 100k. Now they are what, 20+mil?

Read full topic
